# 2π

> The mathematical constant [π][pi] times 2.

<!-- <usage> -->

## Usage

``` javascript
var TWO_PI = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float64-two-pi' );
```

#### TWO_PI

The mathematical constant [π][pi] times `2`.

``` javascript
TWO_PI === 6.283185307179586;
```

<!-- </usage> -->


<!-- <examples> -->

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

``` javascript
var TWO_PI = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float64-two-pi' );

console.log( TWO_PI );
// => 6.283185307179586
```

<!-- </examples> -->
